Name: Rumbera
Ingredients: 50 ml Bacardi Carta Blanca Superior White Rum
5 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Flute glass .
Prepare garnish of rose water mist..
Review: This is a crowd-pleasing cocktail - fruity and just a tad on the sweet side, with pomegranate and rich almond biscotti-like flavours dominating.
History: Irish Bacardí Legacy 2016 winning cocktail by Will Lynch of The Exchequer, Dublin.
Nutrition: One serving of Rumbera contains 170 calories
